snippet: I Paid a Bribe, a site in India, is spawning a movement of corruption-exposing sites and in turn is vexing bribe-seeking bureaucrats all around the globe.
abstract: I Paid a Bribe, a Web site site in India, collects anonymous reports of bribes and bribe requests, spawning a movement of corruption-exposing sites and sparking fear among bribe-seeking bureaucrats around the globe; site founder Swati Ramanathan says nongovernmental organizations and government agencies from at least 17 countries have contacted Janaagraha, the nonprofit organization that operates the site, to obtain the source code to set up similar sites.
lead_paragraph: I Paid a Bribe, a site in India, is spawning a movement of corruption-exposing sites and in turn is vexing bribe-seeking bureaucrats all around the globe.

headline.seo: I Paid a Bribe and Similar Corruption-Exposing Sites Spread
headline.main: Web Sites Shine Light on Petty Bribery Worldwide
headline.print_headline: Web Sites Shine Light on Petty Bribery Worldwide
